lead_paragraph: Geno Auriemma has signed a contract that would keep him as the women’s basketball coach at Connecticut through 2013, the university announced Wednesday. The five-year, $8 million deal begins July 1.
snippet: Geno Auriemma has signed a contract that would keep him as the women’s basketball coach at Connecticut through 2013, the university announced Wednesday. The five-year, $8 million deal begins July 1.
